composer.option: The largest avacados in the known galaxy
ALL VISITORS SUBJECT TO EXTREMELY VIOLATING AND UNCOMFORTABLE SEARCHES.
THIS SETTLEMENT IS UNDER CONTROL OF THE INTERGALACTIC FEDERATION.
Our settlement treasury is larger than {char:main}'s mom.
Don't make eye contact with any of the locals for longer than 4 seconds.
We pour vodka in our cereal.
Please don't stare at our fat people.
ALL VISITORS MUST REPORT TO THE INTERGALACTIC EMBASSY OR FACE ETERNAL DAMNATION.
Everyone here is secretly a robot.
We don't recommend the local food. Strongly.
OUR LOCAL POLITICIANS SIT ON A THRONE OF LIES.
Please disregard the old man who sits in town square shouting about Cat-Jesus.
Excuse our poor quality of life and starving children as we remodel!
Do not pet the dogs - we are having an outbreak of super-rabies.
